Package it.polimi.ingsw.server.model

Class Strongbox

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.server.model.Strongbox
Direct Known Subclasses:
StrongboxStub
public class Strongbox
extends java.lang.Object
Identify Player's Strongbox, composed of unlimited space for storing resources Each player has the reference to a unique and personal Strongbox Here can be store resources coming from productions The resources store here can be used to buy development cards, activate productions and activate leader cards

    • getResourceQuantity

      public int getResourceQuantity​(Resource resource)
      Parameters:
      resource - type of resource required
      Returns:
      quantity of selected resources in stock

    • addResource

      public void addResource​(Resource resource, int quantity) throws NegativeQuantityException
      Save resources produced by a developmentCard. It doesn't really add the resources in the strongbox, to do that you need to call addProduced() method
      Parameters:
      resource - type of resources required
      quantity - number of resources, of the specified type, that have to be added to the Strongbox
      Throws:
      NegativeQuantityException - if quantity is negative.

    • removeResource

      public int removeResource​(Resource resource, int quantity) throws NegativeQuantityException
      Parameters:
      resource - type of resources required
      quantity - number of resources, of the specified type, that have to be removed from the Strongbox
      Throws:
      NegativeQuantityException - if quantity is less than 0

    • addProduced

      public void addProduced()
      Finalize previous productions, adding the resources in the strongbox

      calculate the amount of resources in the strongbox.
      Returns:
      the amount of resources int the strongbox.
